meanings.definition: Emitting a steady light or heat
meanings.sent1: The campfire was glowing warmly in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The lantern cast a soft, glowing light on the path ahead.
meanings.sent3: The glowing embers seemed to dance in the fire pit.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing smile lit up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The glowing stars painted a beautiful picture in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: After a day at the beach, her skin was glowing from the sun.
meanings.sent2: The fresh flowers gave the room a glowing, cheerful vibe.
meanings.sent3: His glowing cheeks made him look like a happy little elf.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a glowing paradise of colorful blooms.
meanings.sent5: The glowing bride looked absolutely stunning in her white dress.

meanings.sent1: The teacher gave a glowing review of the student's project.
meanings.sent2: The author received glowing feedback on her latest book.
meanings.sent3: His glowing words of encouragement lifted her spirits.
meanings.sent4: The glowing testimonials convinced many to try the product.
